title: Best of The Herd: 12/13/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/13/2018
description:
Colin thinks the media has once again fallen for flashy Patrick Mahomes and despite his talents Colin still prefers boring guys like Andrew Luck. He thinks Kawhi Leonard is odd and is not the leader people think he is. Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks to Colin about what is wrong with the Steelers offense and why so many young QBs are succeeding in the NFL. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
